parameters.name: WhichConfigurations
parameters.description: Configurations in which to get this value as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the names of the configurations of size Config_count (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: IDimension.IGetValue3
description: Gets the values of the dimensions in the specified configurations.
signature:
System.Double IGetValue3( 
   System.Int32
WhichConfigurations
,
   System.Int32
Config_count
,
   ref System.String
Config_names
)

parameters.name: WhichConfigurations
parameters.description: Configurations in which to get this value as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the names of the configurations of size Config_count (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of values of the dimensions for the specified configurations of size Config_count (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks: The Config_count and Config_names arguments are only used if WhichConfigurations is set to swSpecifyConfiguration.
